## Description {#details}

One per <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>, this is used to cache the result if-conversion feasibility analysis.

This includes results from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo/#a0dfb0c744373d4b6112eb343a5b07fc7">TargetInstrInfo::analyzeBranch()</a> (i.e. TBB, FBB, and Cond), and its classification, and common tail block of its successors (if it&#39;s a diamond shape), its size, whether it&#39;s predicable, and whether any instruction can clobber the &#39;would-be&#39; predicate.

IsDone - True if BB is not to be considered for ifcvt. IsBeingAnalyzed - True if BB is currently being analyzed. IsAnalyzed - True if BB has been analyzed (info is still valid). IsEnqueued - True if BB has been enqueued to be ifcvt&#39;ed. IsBrAnalyzable - True if analyzeBranch() returns false. HasFallThrough - True if BB may fallthrough to the following BB. IsUnpredicable - True if BB is known to be unpredicable. ClobbersPred - True if BB could modify predicates (e.g. has cmp, call, etc.) NonPredSize - Number of non-predicated instructions. ExtraCost - Extra cost for multi-cycle instructions. ExtraCost2 - Some instructions are slower when predicated BB - Corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>. TrueBB / FalseBB- See analyzeBranch(). BrCond - Conditions for end of block conditional branches. <a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a> - <a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a> used in the BB.

Definition at line 131 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/ifconversion-cpp">IfConversion.cpp</a>.
